items.context: Upgraded from Tampines to D16 condo
items.quote: Elfi actually advised us to wait 6 months. Any other agent would have pushed us to buy. That patience saved us over $50K when the market shifted.

items.context: Upgraded from Bedok to D15 condo
items.quote: We needed to buy before selling but didn't have enough cash. Elfi structured everything so we never felt stretched. She made it feel effortless.
